website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its double-edged blades; once dulled, simply turn them over.
pros: The 20-inch handle is convenient and gets to difficult areas
Pack includes 15 x 4-inch blades, making this a very cost effective shaver
Insert three blades to begin with and once dulled, turn them over
cons: Some users find it isn't effective over ridges, like shoulder blades
Takes a lot of getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Man-scaper.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, like the design and uses the cheap common blades instead of proprietary expensive ones. Other than the ridiculous sized box it shipped in, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: kp20

customer_reviews.title: Way better than BakBlade
customer_reviews.text: I've had the BakBlade and the Bro Shaver and the Bro Shaver destroys the BakBlade in every way. Better shave and way cheaper refills. Highly recommend the Bro Shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor  M Scott

customer_reviews.title: Long term best option.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously do yourself a favor and buy this one over the bakblade as this is far superior. You can replace the blades with normal double edge razors that are incredibly cheap whereas bakblade charges a ridiculous amount for their replacement blades which is just three double edge razors anyways.... This one comes with replacements but you can find any brand you want and swap them out. Go for this product if you want to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Bergh

customer_reviews.title: Like the back blade, only better
customer_reviews.text: If you have, or have heard of, the BackBlade, you know what THIS thing is. Its virtually identical to the BackBlade, with one important distinction. The BackBlade would come with a blade that was DEAD after one shaving, and to replace it, you had to buy replacement proprietary blades at like $15 or whatever they were. The Bro Shaver, despite its stupid name, does the smart thing of allowing you to buy REGULAR blades, therefore being able to replace blades a lot easier, and a LOT cheaper. The blades it comes with are flimsy, and they cut my back to shit in places, but they did their job. DEFINITELY buy this over the BackBlade, without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Highly Effective and Cheap Refills
customer_reviews.text: My husband says: This thing is far better than the bakblade. It made quick work of shaving my back. The handle isn’t very comfortable, but it made such a quick job I didn’t have time for my hand to get fatigued. Love the fact that I can get loads of blades for cheap. Really easy to clean. I used soft slow strokes and it basically just wiped the hair away on one pass. The bakblade 2.0 takes multiple passes even though it has 2 blade sections.
customer_reviews.author: lacy b.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: No more asking someone for help. If your a hairy guy like I am, look no further this product will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: TURNER

customer_reviews.title: YOU GOT TO GET THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I ever made. It has cured me of my back hair problem. 5 strokes and I'm done. Faaaaassstttt. You can't beat the nickle blade replacement price. I got a hundred blades for 6 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I had reasonable expectations about this purchase - not too high, not too low - but the piece of plastic that holds the razor blade was defective/damaged, so the device would not work properly. I contacted customer service on June 12, 2018, and I received a prompt reply on June 13, 2018 informing me that I would receive a replacement mounting plate. I never received that plate.
customer_reviews.author: Bjornstam

customer_reviews.title: It's the most effective back shaver and the cost Is the best
customer_reviews.text: I Loved the cost and I have used others in the past and this is the Best by far
customer_reviews.author: t thompson

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Bak Blade
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, much better product. No more buying overpriced cartridges from Bak Blade that don't fit the handle correctly and dull in no time. This takes normal safety razor blades so it's easy to replace the blades and much cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: Music Critic

customer_reviews.title: not to bad
customer_reviews.text: I differently don't regret getting this rather then the backblade. This thing for the money is ten times better. It does take a little getting used to, I've nicked myself a number of times. I recommend using it out of the shower as you have more room and light. but all in all i definitely recommend the Bro Shaver and don't forget to buy a box of cheap refill razors, stuff will last you ages.
customer_reviews.author: Estevan Silva

customer_reviews.title: Better on subsequent uses...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, I cut myself a lot. After I figured out how to reach different areas without twisting it and angling the blades and cutting myself, there was a lot less bleeding. I'm getting better at it each time.
customer_reviews.author: GT Suchy

customer_reviews.title: Good shaver, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the bro shaver in July 2017. It rusted within two months. I contacted the seller, after reading reviews about a change in the materials, and they offered to replace it. I simply paid the shipping, which definitely beats buying a new shaver. A+ customer service. This shaver is way better than the Bakblade that I had before, but it's still not perfect. The middle nut is hard to get to, and the handle is hollowed out with ridges, which can be awkward to hold at certain angles. Overall, I would definitely recommend this shaver, and I look forward to whatever they come up with next.
customer_reviews.author: Max E

customer_reviews.title: Especially good for larger guys.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several back shavers over the years. This is my favorite, due to it's shear size. I am a bigger fellow and some of the back shavers had trouble reaching where i needed to get to. Be careful it is basically an oversized safety razor and the same precautions need to be taken such as making sure you move in straight strokes and dont accidently go sideways or you will rip yourself apart.. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: InfidelUberAlles

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the bakeblade “ Soooo much easier to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the bakeblade “ Soooo much easier to use sharp replaceable blades very inexpensive to buy I suggest this to anyone that has been using back blade I was a loyal customer to back blade and I will never buy back blade are there refills again
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is easy to use after a few goes
customer_reviews.text: After using this a couple times, it's like regular shaving... you figure it out. Only got a couple nicks early on when I let the thing move "sideways, think east and west, and it will nick you then... if you keep it moving only north and south, no nicks. So, why 4 stars... I left the first one in the shower so it would be available anytime I needed it... the stainless knurled knobs that held it together rusted solid. Second one, I make sure the steel part stays dry unless it's in use and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cox

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Inexpensive and It Works
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. I'm so glad I chose this more inexpensive solution. I had a few others chosen as a result of my search for the consumer reported favorites; the top favorites were much more expensive so I figured for the price of this shaver, if it didn't work, I wasn't out of pocket much. It worked amazingly well. This one has 3 razors that seat in alignment totaling what must be about 4" of razor width. I did my entire back in about 10 minutes with no rash or irritation. You really can't go wrong with this razor. It's also very light with a long handle which makes it easy to manipulate. I highly recommend this shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Divesheik

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Easy to use even for someone who isn't limber like myself. I'm able to shave my whole back flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: James Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: I keep it hung up in the shower because I find the best shave after my back is moistened by the hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it several times already. I keep it hung up in the shower because I find the best shave after my back is moistened by the hot water and it reminds me to use it. I tried the dry shave and I had several nicks and my back itched. I love the wide surface it only takes a few minutes of maintenance after the initial shave. No more bothering the wifey, and she is happy because she hates back hair. Well done Bro Shaver
customer_reviews.author: irishlad

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised and is super easy to load the blades. There seems to be mixed reviews about cutting yourself, yes you can nick your skin if you have a mole or raised freckle, this cut one on my back and yes I installed the blades correctly. With all that being said this thing works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tala Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Do not use this at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and is easy to use, especially if you're already familiar with shaving (your face) with a dual-edge razor. Note that the product description provides three pictures of models using the Broshaver at the beach. Do not shave your back at the beach, as women will find this unattractive. Other places you should not use this product include waiting in line at Six Flags, at dinner when meeting your girlfriend's parents for the first time, at your nephew's baptism, or when serving as a chaperone as the senior prom.
customer_reviews.author: Scottyb06

customer_reviews.title: Finally!Great for a anybody who’s has to scape alone lol
customer_reviews.text: I never could shave my back as it was near impossible to reach the center of my back,not anymore. The blade install was no biggie and I went right into shaving. It takes a while to figure out the best way to reach ol all the areas but it will tear down a hair jungle and leave the back bare Blades are nice and sharp so if you have any raised imperfections it may nick them a All in all this is the perfect tool for any guy
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Jensen

customer_reviews.title: So much better than MANGROOMER!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a MANGROOMER electric back shaver. It broke within 3 uses and was not that effective while it lasted. The BRO SHAVER is a much better product. The triple blade design allows for rapid shaving of large areas of skin, and it costs pennies to replace the blades. I expect this product to last for many years and have a very low cost of maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Kudos to these guys for not using stupid proprietary blades
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it a 4 is because of the size of the handle... Theres no conceivable reason its so thick! I have big hands and its still awkward to hold... Also for a few dollars more it could have a rubber grip instead of hard plastic. Another complaint which is totally my fault... I used high end face shaving blades and completely sliced a mole i had on my back! It bled for quite some time, so next time Ill have to be more careful. Kudos to these guys for not using stupid proprietary blades.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Patton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty high quality shaver
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Takes a shaving session or two to get the hang of it - i.e., the right shaving angles and directions. But, it's good for a quick clean up before hitting the gym. Be sure your back is clean and supple from a recent shower, but not wet. Try and minimize the strokes over one spot. I shaved totally dry the first time and went over many areas too many times. It felt like I had a sunburn afterward. I like the fact that I can buy just a pack of blades and replace them myself. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Handler

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to get one?
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this thing works, it's simple and it's inexpensive comparably speaking to other offerings. I was so skeptical of these things that I just suffered being a Yeti until yesterday. I could not believe how well it worked. Is it prefect, no, but it's close. For the results you get, the investment is beyond worth it. It doesn't matter how congested your back is, the Bro Shaver will tame it. It works best in short strokes than in long sweeping ones. If you want something that isn't complicated, little or no moving parts and works as it should, buy this thing. I will also add, I did not get razor burn and I have fair, sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: i'm the missing link
customer_reviews.text: I am a missing link according to 23andme. I am so harry when I shave my body I fill up about 2 garbage bags full of fur. This product has a smart way of holding the razor blades. I use it in the shower and can shave with my back just wet, but I will also use regular soap or shaving cream. Anything that is slippery will work. I have even used this dry to reach a few spots requiring my mirror. This product had saved me $$$ as I no longer need to hire a hobo off the street to shave my back.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving solution!
customer_reviews.text: Good, simple concept. Basically an oversized safety razor. Just like dad's old safety razor, it is easy to get nicked if you move the blade sideways across the skin or hold the angle too low. Otherwise I really like it and the shaver works great. Handle is light weight and shaped for reaching areas that would be difficult or impossible with a small disposable razors. Blades that came with the shaver are sharp and worked fine both wet and dry. I chose this over other brands specifically because replacement blades are inexpensive and available everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: A + V

customer_reviews.title: A real time saver
customer_reviews.text: It works fantastically. Not the best blades that come with it, but it's easy to find good replacements. There's a bit of a learning curve before you can get the hang of it, but I went from taking 30 minutes down to 15 to shave my entire back. A couple of tips: Store this outside of your shower to prolong the life and sharpness of your blades. Change the blades out after 2 uses. It cuts way back on irritation and the potential for ingrown hair. Used once or twice a week this thing has saved me a ton of time compared to traditional body groomers.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D.

customer_reviews.title: Needing a long handle to shave your legs?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have frozen shoulder syndrome in both shoulders. It’s hard to reach down to shave my legs. Since you place the blades in a location to work for each person, I put one in the center area. For me, it’s easiest to put enough pressure in the center area and shave my legs. I know it’s got a place to put three blades at a time, but for me the long handle is what I need most.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Bakblade
customer_reviews.text: I fell for the Bakblade a few years ago. Hey, it worked, sorta ok, wasn't too bad. Then I saw how much the damn blades cost. And I haven't used it since it got dull. I see this browsing one day, hum, a Bakblade style thing, but lo and behold it uses cheap and readily available razor blades! So, it's what the Bakblade should have been, unlike the inkjet printer style model of sales where they sell you a handle then bend you over with the blades.
customer_reviews.author: dexterw1n

customer_reviews.title: Backblade NEVER again!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and gave it a go. I've used the popular Backblade and it did a so so job. What was strange was some blades would be good while others didn't seem to do anything but irritate my back. This Bro Shaver very easily cleaned off my back. Came with a bunch of blades and the refills are WAY more affordable. Not sure how many shaves the blades will do but as of now I'm super happy I gave this a try.
customer_reviews.author: J. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Invention Ever!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I did my whole upper body in like 15 minutes. I used it dry, no shower first or shaving cream and had no problem. I had always used trimmers like the Mangroomer. This was easier, faster, and my back is smooth with no stubble.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rejniak

customer_reviews.title: Same As....
customer_reviews.text: same as backshaver 1.0, but dont bother using the blades that come with it. they are really bad and if I was the company selling this I would not even include them as it can make someone thing this product sucks. I had opened backshaver 1.0 (shaver is glued) it uses the same cheap wilkinson blades which made me upset for the price they charged. backshaver 2.0 was different. Here what I do now..... Bro Shaver is for my home and Bakshaver 2.0 is for on the go (it folds and not as large).
customer_reviews.author: Guy D.

customer_reviews.title: Toss your Mangroomer
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. Best back shaver I've ever used. Works great and works fast. Easy to clean. Comes with 15 blades. (Uses 3 at one time.) The only con I can think of is that I wish it had a folding handle for storage ( it's nearly 2 ft. long)....but that's a minor gripe considering how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, super cheap refills, does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I've never been a hairy guy, but every since I turned 40 this year, hair started sprouting in new places, my back being one of those places. Been shaving my head for years, but couldn't quite reach all the spots on my back with a regular razor. As soon as I found out that the Back Blade uses proprietary cartridges I went searching for an alternative. Used it a couple times already and it does an excellent job - definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use it for dry shaving and it works like a charm. After 3 shaves it's going strong on the first set of blades. I do recommend some sort of aftershave with a dissinfectant in order to avoid breaking out. Some users claim the blades become dull after some light use. What actually happens is the blades get full of hair. You need to disassemble the blade assembly after use and blow the hair out. After that, you are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mango-Pancakes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use back shaver
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using a back shaver, and I am very pleased I bought the BroShaver Back Hair Shaver. I've had it for several months now and my back is nice and smooth looking "no hairs" The first time is a challenge to get those unsightly hairs off, I recommend go slow the first time and depending on how dense your hair is, get in the tub to do this or put a towel on the floor to catch the hair. Depending on your hair growth, for me twice a week shaving is all I need to maintain a smooth back.
customer_reviews.author: Bridge A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptic to buy this as reviews about it being dangerous made sense. However after the first use I kept thinking why didn't I buy this long ago! I put the blades carefully and tried it on my arm first. It was totally fine so I moved to my back somewhat nervous and it was actually a delight! It felt like scratching my back. Of course one must use caution with this and "scrub" gently all those embarrasing hairs away. I used it without water or soap, just the dry blades on my dry back and it worked perfectly. Took about 10 minutes to leave my back hairless and spotless, no rash whatsoever. I'm really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the BRO SHAVER performance.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the BRO SHAVER. I have only used it once, but, it worked very well without any cuts. But, you obviously have to respect the single edge safety razor shaving techniques. I have tried other products (mangroomer) and I was not satisfied and could not recommend the others. Hot shower to hydration, step out to shave in mirror, return to hot water shower, shave missing spots.
customer_reviews.author: GatewayRH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Before this I had the bacblade, which was a big mistake. I say this because I was spending so much on replacement blades. However, this product is amazing, it does the same job and achieves the same results, while also being super cost friendly. I would highly recommend this product if you have hair on your back and want it gone fast and cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Idea is great but you cannot do ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Idea is great but you cannot do it by yourself without cutting your back. I bled for hours. I don't write many reviews but this product is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Better than some but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The handle inside not shown in photos is hollow and not that comfortable to hold. If it was a solid piece or the grip was on the inside (since that's where my hands are most of the time) it would be better. The blades are fine but not as good as some others I have for my safety razor so once I finish with the ones included I will replace with another brand. But I am glad I can use replaceable blades rather than using a proprietary cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Don't second guess the purchase.  Makes life much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I received it in the mail yesterday and used it for the first time today. No single back shaving device can ever be perfect because of the different curves in our back, how muscular you are, etc. This BROSHAVER is super easy to use. Blades are easy to install and you just let the device do the work. Long handle is great and helped me effectively shave about 95% of my back. I then went back through with my beard razor to clean up the rest. My life is so much easier now with this bad boy!
customer_reviews.author: DIGGITYDIGS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I had a back shaver already... so I was hesitant to buy this $30 piece of plastic. But let me tell you... it is so worth it. I used to have a mangroomer pro xl... that thing was a total piece of garbage. Not only does this get a closer shave, but it’s cheaper, easier to use, and doesn’t hurt like the mangroomer. I strongly recommend this to anyone with back hair. Shaving your back is now enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are you hairy?
customer_reviews.text: If you are wanting the absolute smoothest back, then the Bro Shaver is your choice of back hair removal. It is the easiest way to remove hair from your back. I have tried everything from my own tiny razor to other back razors and this is the superior option. The Bro Shaver makes it easy to reach spots that I have never been able to reach! The replaceable razors make it an even better purchase and worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: Seriously cheaply made product. Can’t cost more than $0.50 to manufacture. No where even close to the quality of the Bak Blade 2.0. Having used both I think the Bak Blade works way better of the two but the cost of replacement blades for the Bak Blade are ridiculous. Each is only good for about two close shaves. You get what you pay for but to save a lot of money in the long run I’ll keep just buying cheap razor blades for this Bro shaver. Follow up: After further uses of the Bro Shaver I’ve decided to suck it up and pay the extra money for the Bak Blake refills.
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I came across this thing before but it works as its designed, at least for me. I am not sure how people are cutting themselves using this product, as shown in some of the other reviews. I use a DE safety razor for my daily shaving routine shaving my face so I am accustomed to using regular razor blades. The best part about this product is you can use your own blades. You just have to make sure you install them correctly before using, perhaps thats where some make the mistake and end up with cuts. Also, dont press, just let the device glide against your skin and the razor will do that rest.
customer_reviews.author: Dejan Knezevic

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not the perfect answer.
customer_reviews.text: So it works as intended, but is big and bulky. Little worried about cuts, so I was very slow and deliberate. No issue there. Storage is an issue due to size.
customer_reviews.author: gene evans

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to bleed!!
customer_reviews.text: It works, but prepare to bleed! Any blemish, mole, etc will be shaved off too. I thought that maybe it was the blades so i swapped them with some Derby blades I've used for years with my safety razor. No difference. Tried shaving wet & dry with no better result. It is effective & relatively quick, but there are better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Mantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bro. When my girlfriend moved out I didn't initially realize the dilemma at hand. Luckily through some quick googling and 2-day prime shipping, I was able to take back control of the situation. Razor works well, probably a little expensive for what it is but worth it none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H- Truthful reviews

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent.
customer_reviews.text: The best money I've spent for my confidence haha. Closest shave possible and best if used dry. Never have used straight edge razors and they intimidated me but they might rage out the typical razors from Gillette/mach. First day using it and I love it. The only reason I had never bond this was because I was skeptical of using Straight Edge Brazzers but they were harmless. Just take it easy even you use it.
customer_reviews.author: RQza

customer_reviews.title: Does the Trick
customer_reviews.text: Most importantly, this thing works as expected. I've never used it in the shower, but it seems to work just fine as a dry shaver. It also irritates my skin slightly less than electric shavers I've tried. However, it does take some getting used to and can be somewhat difficult to master. Depending on your reach, flexibility, amount of hair and back shape, it can be a challenge to get every hair trimmed (especially near the shoulder blades). Overall I'm quite pleased and would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: RC Cola

customer_reviews.title: Save Yourself the Trouble and Pain
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bad review I’ve ever posted on a product. Soaked in a hot bath for twenty minutes, applied some shaving cream to the shaver, then proceeded to cut my back in three locations in the first two minutes. I guess the product is meant for non-muscular, hairy people. The angle of the head is fixed and the handle is rigid. Any attempt to reposition the head will cut you.
customer_reviews.author: M S Turner

customer_reviews.title: It works!! Without cuts
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get cuts.... which was the one thing I was worried about. Apply shaving cream under! Clean the blade after every run. I was a bit aggressive to assume I could shave my whole back on my own, I’m a pretty hairy guy however this was able to remove a large sum of hair (I used a mirror). Some touch up is still required after!! It’s somewhat hard to get the right angles.
customer_reviews.author: Dren G.

customer_reviews.title: It worked but is WAY harder than someone just clippering your back.
customer_reviews.text: It works but, it's difficult to get into bends and creases in you muscles. two spot on the shoulder blades took more time than the rest of my back. The blades rust but not the screws. I did receive a few cuts, some that bled a lot. It will shave off the heads of bumps and pimples and things. I have really stopped using it it such a pain. Just not shaving my back right now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not a BOT ! Why 5 stars ? READ !
customer_reviews.text: Being a Bro is tough and after being one for so long I started turning into a baby gorilla. The hair I was accumulating on my back was starting to get insane, and in the game we can't have nothing wrong with us genetically. Jesus I sound like a commercial, il just say this was the first and last back shaver il ever own. It's safe It works phenomenally well It's like if Harry's Shavers made a back shaver. That's what id compare it to, except it's 3 blades in a row, instead of back to back - no pun.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous - Reviewer !

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - Will shave skin off
customer_reviews.text: Still recovering from the skin it shaved off of the side of my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Simplistic design with extraordinary results!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of different shavers before making my decision. Was not disappointed with my choice! Design is simplistic but works amazing. Other shavers the replacement blades are very expensive and are nothing more than a larger version of the safety razor. I was able to shave the first time in about 15 mins and got great results. Since now having mastered the correct movements maintenance takes 5 mins. Easy to clean and one side of the blade in maintenance mode gets me 3 shaves then flip blade and get 3 more. So 6 weeks out of the blades versus paying more for a one time blade on other shavers. Plain and simple highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MM06FAN

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy, no issues
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and easy to use, why anyone would complain about getting cut baffles me, the teeth make sure the blades don't actually contact the skin. Maybe if you had a bunch of pimples, I just don't see a way to cut yourself. I followed the instructions and did it wet,
customer_reviews.author: david wood

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT....INEXPENSIVE BLADES
customer_reviews.text: I've used every product currently in production in an attempt to keep the hair on my back under control. This one is the best so far and the reason is quite simple. The blades. The blades utilized are standard razor blades and can be purchased just about anywhere. They are sharp, cut close to the skin and very easy to replace. Most of all, however, they are extremely inexpensive. Don't buy the product that forces you to use their proprietary blades. Buy this one. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Louisville Wookie

customer_reviews.title: Does a mediocre job at best
customer_reviews.text: Bro Shaver 2.2 works OK. I did not have any issues with it cutting me. I have tried both modes mild and saucy. I used the included blades as well as Astra, Feather, and Gillette 7'oclock. I would recommend a high quality blade as this did improve the overall result. I would not spend $40 on it again, it is fairly cheaply made worth maybe about $20- $25 in my opinion and the results are just O.K.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: The "BRO SHAVER" super easy to use product with Blades included!
customer_reviews.text: So what is the big deal about blades being included, well the BRO SHAVER Gorilla Warfare: Special Forces Edition comes with enough blades to keep you clean for so your partner won't think they are petting an animal in bed (unless you are into that)... I ordered the "BAKblade" in the past and found not only was it overpriced, heavy tool, they are also want to make money from selling blades! What a joke!!! The "BRO SHAVER Gorilla Warfare: Special Forces Edition" is a simple tool and will do all the work with little effort! Stay clean Bros!
customer_reviews.author: robert j ingram

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: OK so I read many reviews and I was careful on first use. I tried dry and wet and I prefer wet, though It did a good job also dry. I did cut myself, but it was definitely user error, just need some practice. I love that I can use the cheap blades from the grocery store and not having to buy expensive proprietary ones. One thing is for sure, no more asking for favors to the old lady at home. More independence!! Good job
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio

customer_reviews.title: Get Your BRO ON...
customer_reviews.text: Get your BRO On...this is the real deal. For short and hairy men, this will be good for your self esteem. I have tried other products before but this is the best. I sliced the hell out of my hands replacing the blades the first time. That was the one challenge. I think once you figure that out it isn’t so bad. The blades seem to be lasting quite a while for me....
customer_reviews.author: Brighton Bacchus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at how well this thing works!! So easy! I had to give it 4 stars because of the handle... It should have been a closed type, (fully rounded). It is a little uncomfortable but totally works! I definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first
customer_reviews.text: Never shaved my silver back gorilla hair before so I decide to try it out dry. Figured this would be worse case. First path felt weird but not painful just tugging. I was surprised at how much hair was taken so I kept going and before I knew it I had the carpet all trimmed down to a stubble. I would recommend this product and just wish I had found it sooner in my life. So many years of the Gorilla look.
customer_reviews.author: Romano G. Chiari

customer_reviews.title: Cheap refills.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shaver with very inexpensive refills, and you can use any brand of DE blade. Good reach. It's very easy to change the blades, & you won't cut yourself if you have any sense. I bought this to shave my back to get better adhesion for my new TENS unit. I have not used anything else to shave my back, & have only had this a week.
customer_reviews.author: jcewl93

customer_reviews.title: Handle could be longer, be careful of cuts.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the handle was longer. Im 6'2" and I had a hard time reaching the middle of my back. I cut myself twice the first time i used it. Be careful around lumpy areas like the shoulder blades, thats where my cuts are. I like the fact it uses generic blades. My back is smooth so overall Im happy. I like to be able to groom myself and not bother my wife with it. Its not perfect but I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: jmc305

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but figured I'd give this a try. Much to my surprise it's a really good product. Take your time, go slow, and let the razor do the work. You barely have to run it over your skin to work with little to no pressure. If you "scrape" it across your back, you will bleed. Using shaving cream helps a bunch. Very happy with it and it does a good job!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Joseph Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A single man's dream. I no longer need a girlfriend, I can keep sending them on their way after a long, passionate 8 seconds. I only kept them around because I couldn't reach my back to shave it anyway. This does that easily and efficiently, and doesn't talk back. In addition, refills are cheap. Unlike my exes..
customer_reviews.author: Eric Marriner

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: I have tried electric back trimmers and the bak blade. This one is by far the best. Electric ones scratch and didn't get as close as I wanted. Always left stubble. The bakblade is good but dulled quickly and still left a little stubble. This blade uses safety razor blades, which are easy to find, very sharp and inexpensive. It gets very close shave. It took years but this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The ad and photos clearly say this includes 15 blades but mine arrived without any blades. Somehow the picture in my orders list says “blades not included” but, again, the picture on the ad clearly says they are included. So feeling like I got cheated here.
customer_reviews.author: skittles

customer_reviews.title: Seems dumb but works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Hairy back and butt, huh? This definitely gets the job done, there's no doubt about it. The replaceable blades that come with it are sharp but don't cut you so don't worry. Follow the directions closely and you'll be glad you got this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Robb

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it! A dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it...But as a Master Barber, I find he gets alot of in grown hairs that instead of shaving him I am fixing ingrown hairs and he itches a lot and I am of course scratching his back. So I advise. Shaving cream or lotiion.
customer_reviews.author: Gammy

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. I'm sure you will, too!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! It is a much better deal to be able to use a standard blade instead of a proprietary blade in other brands. Blades are sharp and last a good amount of time. If I could change one thing about it though it would be that I would make it hinged in the center of the stick to better facilitate traveling with it. I'll make that happen to mine somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more and just buy this one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is more expensive than the many cheaper options but it will save you A LOT of money in the long run. The replacement blades are MUCH less expensive and you could replace them much more often for much less money than buying the proprietary replacement blades from any of the other back razors.
customer_reviews.author: Reptilia

customer_reviews.title: Works great, little pricey...
customer_reviews.text: The bro shaver is works extremely well. No batteries to worry about, no mechanical parts to fail and no expensive refills. The handle is.kore then adequate to reach any part of your back. The shave is clean and in my case nick and irritation free. The blades are easy to set in place. I am knocking down a single star because it is a little pricey for an injection molded part.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I just used it and shaving my back has just become a pleasure not a pain. I’m curious to see how long the blades last and they are usable on both sides. Just flip them over. Right now extremely pleased. Thank you. Deeparn
customer_reviews.author: Donald Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. A dry shave will irritate your skin for a couple of hours, but it’s not a big deal. I don’t have to ask my wife to shave my back anymore, and I can shave it in a quarter of the time. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Sam W.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you want it to do!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research in advance and went back and forth between Bro Shaver and Bakblade. Ultimately decided on the Bro Shaver for its longer reach and I can replace blades without spending a fortune. I’ve used it in the shower as well as dry and it does what it’s supposed to do. I was the ultimate skeptic, but figured if it didn’t work and I was out a few bucks, no big deal. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: actually a pretty easy run
customer_reviews.text: Did my first shave with it dry...no pain, no scrapes, actually a pretty easy run. I had a little trouble in some spots with positioning but I’m sure I’ll get the hang of it. And I like that I can use regular safety blades and not expensive replacements. Blades that came with it are alright. Not super sharp but got the job done. I still gotta try it after a shower but I’m sure it’ll be as good or better.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose Souder

customer_reviews.title: LIKE A BUTCHER CUTTING A ROAST.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of back hair and hard to reach all of the areas so I bought this. Cuts the hair and rips up my back leaving trails of blood that needs band aids. Used this 2x so far and got the same results each time. Wet the back with water/shaving cream...to no avail.I am done with this. It does cut some hair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Linet

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have used other brands, manual and electric, and like this the best.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The head is at a good angle to do the job
customer_reviews.text: This thing works quite well. It seems a bit pricy for a cheaply made piece of plastic but it performs quite well. The head is at a good angle to do the job. The blades are held securely and the “combs” reduce the risk of a cut. I would have given it 5 stars if it cost less. 3 double edge blades all lined up makes for a wide path of hair removal with each pass.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality. Product description incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: Shaft was snapped in half when I received it, though the box it was shipped in seemed fine. There is no “shave button”. You have to take it apart to adjust the setting. There is also not a detachable handle. It comes apart at the head in order to insert razor blades, but it states you can use it without a nonexistent extension. It seems like the advertising for this product is for a completely different model, but the packaging shows I received the expected model. I’m pretty disappointed and confused. I was able to glue the handle back together, but will likely return this product based on their satisfaction guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Useful And Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item with hopes I would no longer need to ask for assistance shaving my back. I have to say I am pleasantly surprised how well and how close a shave this shaver gets. I would recommend this product to anyone in a similar situation that I was in. I also like the fact that it works great without the need to wet or add cream to your back, just start shaving away. (Pros) - Inexpensive shaver and replacement blades - Easy to assemble and use - No need to wet or add cream for close shave (Cons) - I have none at this current time (will update if issues arise)
customer_reviews.author: Biggly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing; this will save you thousands.
customer_reviews.text: If you're using the other back shavers with $3/5 blades, please consider this one! You can use this one with blades for a penny and it works better. I also switched to a safety razor for shaving and I can use the same blades that cost pennies. Guys, you have to check these out.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a expensive piece of plastic that’s not easy to use. I’ve tried them all and the only one that gets the job done is the man groomer. I’ve got thick back hair and it’s uncomfortable in the summer and this product doesn’t work for me. Spend a little more money and buy a product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair today but not for long
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is amazing! Followed the instructions and took my time during the first use. Just me and my bathroom mirror. About 20 minutes later, I have a perfectly smooth back. No nicks or missed spots. My back feels smooth to the touch. Now I won't avoid the pool or lake this summer. A very smart purchase for me. I wish I had thought to take a before and after picture.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Where are the 15 razors???? Update: Received 15 blades !!
customer_reviews.text: "BRO SHAVER Back Hair Shaver, Uses Standard Double Edge (DE) Safety Razor Blades, Stainless Steel Bolts, Cheap refills, Blades cost pennies, 15 razors included, Do-it-yourself" NO RAZORS INCLUDED WITH MY ORDER AT ALL! I changed my previous review because I was contacted by NinjaGizmos who sent me a set of blades! Thanks for being responsive!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best – forget the rest!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST! My back is extremely hairy (yuck) and this product ALWAYS does a better job than the 3 VERY expensive electric models I have tried in the past. Forget the Nair, too! I have not experienced any problem with use. It is also easy to use for my shoulders .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea of replaceable blades....
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it came with one of the teeth broke... but even if it didnt I probably would have returned it. Very cheaply made, and awkward to hold. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Farabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as i hoped it would
customer_reviews.text: This was the solution i was looking for. It's the first back shaver I've used and it works exactly as it should. I used my Feather blades instead of the cheap ones it came with. Only knick i had was where i have a very small mole ( that i forgot about so my fault ). Get the two blade version instead of the 3 blade. It makes it easier to go over the contours of your back. Have a mirror handy so you can see wtf your doing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Rest!
customer_reviews.text: By far better than all the back shavers out there. I love the easily replaceable blades and the smooth shave each time. The blades last quite a while, too. I wish I bought the version with three blades, rather than two, but now I know. The only downside is that the handle is flimsy; it could use some more robust engineering and be a bit longer. Still, no regrets and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the impossible to reach places, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver, works wonderfully, tread lightly on your 1st use, becomes second nature very quickly. I swear by this thing, really excellent, quick and clean. Just change the blades and loosen/tighten the 3 bolts every so often to prevent rust from settling and locking them down. But all around, a great shaver, safe, quick and effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Used it first day it came.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have not been cut by it. I placed the blades on the part that comes off. 1,2,3 in order. Hand tightened. Did a dry shave(says not recommended) worked fine. I’ve never gotten my back so hairless without a form of help from someone else. Works great for your chest and arms too. Having a wide body and blades helps keep a good symmetrical look if you are going for a certain shave on your chest.
customer_reviews.author: J.K

customer_reviews.title: Removes hair from your back with a lower TCO than their competitors!
customer_reviews.text: Hairy back? Don't want your significant other to have to deal with it? Don't want to be locked into expensive razor replacements? If you answered "Yes" to these questions then you owe it to yourself to buy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Works good, great price. Excellent gift for the Man in your life. I purchased this for my bf and it has really made grooming easier for him, great for getting to those areas in your upper to mid back. I like how the razors can be replaced by generic brands you can purchase in a drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie A.

customer_reviews.title: If you are a wildebeest like me don't think twice just buy it you wont regret it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great no clippers needed its as easy as using a back scratcher my back hair situation was in bad shape hadnt been shaved in over a year on the first use I was comparable to shaving a wildebeest and best of all I did it on my own!!! The comb feature pulls the hair up for a super close shave.Plus no awkward asking anyone for help!! You can manscape on your own!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BRO SHAVER Back Hair Shaver, Uses Standard Double Edge (DE) Safety Razor Blades, Cheap Penny Refills, Stainless Steel Bolts, 15 Razors Included, Do-it-Yourself
feature_bullets: 60-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE & 1 YEAR WARRANTY: We are confident that this will be the greatest back shaver you have ever used, period. If you’re not satisfied for any reason, we will refund your purchase 100% guaranteed. Plus you’re covered by a one year warranty. This Bro stands by you.

SHAVE WET OR DRY: Our NEW Comfy Cloud Shaving Technology delivers comfort and prevents skin irritation, even with dry shaving. Our blade refills are nearly 50 times cheaper and name brand compared to backBladed shavers with plastic holders hiding double edge razors inside. Don’t be fooled with competitors high priced refills and their handling, gluing then repackaging low quality double edge razors in plastic holders that are dull, crooked, rust, don’t last, and are bad for the environment.

FAST AND PAINLESS DO-IT-YOURSELF BACK SHAVER: You won’t need help with back hair removal anymore. This is the smoothest, closest, most comfortable, safest and forgiving shave with the industries longest handle for greatest reach and comfort, lowest cost (just pennies) blade refills, premium quality with world class razors, stainless steel parts, strong reinforced handle, and easy loading. Includes 15 high stainless steel double edge safety blades enough for 10 fresh blade changes!

BACK SHAVING DISRUPTED: 100% water resistant. The Bro Shaver offers the smoothest most comfortable shave that is guarded, forgiving, and protected. Use any world class double edge razor brands, then flip them over and use the other side. All for just pennies. It’s honest blade refill cost and clean. No more refill rip-off!

AUTHENTIC AND THE ORIGINAL: Designed by an American company with over 15 years of experience, numerous patents, and know-how making back hair shavers. This is the latest model with orange comb. We have what you want: Outrageously fast, comfortable, easy and close shaving. The solution you've been waiting for. Enjoy Bro!
